p
the 0-based spinor index, counted in this ONV from right to left
the phase factor (+1 or -1) that arises by applying an annihilation or creation operator on spinor p
's say that there are m electrons in the orbitals up to p (not included). If m is even, the phase factor is (+1) and if m is odd, the phase factor is (-1), since electrons are fermions.
